apis.description: Get a list of all the question records for this quiz submission. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

operations.notes: Get a list of all the question records for this quiz submission. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Associations to include with the quiz submission question.

apis.description: Provide or update an answer to one or more QuizQuestions.

operations.notes: Provide or update an answer to one or more QuizQuestions.

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description:
The attempt number of the quiz submission being taken. Note that this
must be the latest attempt index, as questions for earlier attempts can
not be modified.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description:
The unique validation token you received when the Quiz Submission was
created.

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

parameters.name: quiz_questions
parameters.description:
Set of question IDs and the answer value.

See {Appendix: Question Answer Formats} for the accepted answer formats
for each question type.

apis.description:
Matches the intended behavior of the UI when a numerical answer is entered
and returns the resulting formatted number

operations.summary: Get a formatted student numerical answer.
operations.notes:
Matches the intended behavior of the UI when a numerical answer is entered
and returns the resulting formatted number

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: answer
parameters.description: no description

apis.description:
Set a flag on a quiz question to indicate that you want to return to it
later.

operations.notes:
Set a flag on a quiz question to indicate that you want to return to it
later.

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description:
The attempt number of the quiz submission being taken. Note that this
must be the latest attempt index, as questions for earlier attempts can
not be modified.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description:
The unique validation token you received when the Quiz Submission was
created.

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

apis.description:
Remove the flag that you previously set on a quiz question after you've
returned to it.

operations.notes:
Remove the flag that you previously set on a quiz question after you've
returned to it.

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description:
The attempt number of the quiz submission being taken. Note that this
must be the latest attempt index, as questions for earlier attempts can
not be modified.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description:
The unique validation token you received when the Quiz Submission was
created.

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

id.description: The ID of the QuizQuestion this answer is for.

answer.description: The provided answer (if any) for this question. The format of this parameter depends on the type of the question, see the Appendix for more information.

answers.description: The possible answers for this question when those possible answers are necessary.  The presence of this parameter is dependent on permissions.
